email_body: Stupid taxes Bill White@ENRON 05/30/2000 04:52 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: IRS Beers Remember we were trying to figure out the difference in return between tax free investment growth and annually-taxed investment growth? Turns out that it is different, but over 5 years and a 10% growth rate, it doesn't amount to much more than the cost of our beer tab. See attached.
